abilities.description: Luffy uses this technique to defeat the Lord of the Coast. This is the first time this specific moment is properly animated in the series.
abilities.demonstration: Luffy stretches his arm back and launches a powerful punch that defeats the Sea King.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Lord of the Coast
keyMoments.description: Luffy uses Gomu Gomu no Pistol to defeat the Lord of the Coast, the same Sea King that ate Shanks' arm. This moment is properly animated for the first time.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's mastery of his Devil Fruit powers and his readiness to begin his journey.
